# address

**Instance Property**

The address of the buffer in the current process’ virtual memory space.

## Declaration

```swift
uint64_t address;
```

## Getting the Address Information

- **length**: The size of the memory buffer, in bytes.

items.description: The size of the memory buffer, in bytes.
